title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on International Law, Justice and Accountability
purpose: To accommodate discussions and engagement on international law standards and use them to ensure justice and accountability for core international crimes. To work on strengthening the existing mechanisms for the prevention of international crimes, and foster cooperation with international mechanisms.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 8783.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Dr Ewelina Ochab, International Bar Association’s Human Rights Institute. Tel: 07531 362203
contact_details.secretariat: International Bar Association’s Human Rights Institute acts as the group's secretariat. https://www.ibanet.org/IBAHRI
